title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practice Competencies: Emergency Response Simulation Training for Occupational Health Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners explain emergency response procedures for workplace emergencies with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners perform Basic Life Support (BLS) skills in a simulation environment with 90% or higher proficiency.

Learners, organized in teams of four, can select one of three emergency response scenarios (e.g., cardiac arrest, burns, fractures), develop a team collaboration protocol using AI-based decision support tools, and submit a ≤15-page report and 5-minute presentation. The protocol must score ≥14/20 on the expert evaluation rubric (clarity, feasibility, innovation).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
